ygData.subject: Re: Manasong during battle.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Both ID and Begging are skills that only get a chance to increase if you are successful.  Once you get ID (and I assume Beg) over 50 it goes up fairly fast
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > Speaking of Instill Doubt, it appears it does not cap at 75 like I had
> > heard, got mine to 78 last night!
>
> What's the secret to get it up faster? I swear, I have practiced
> it for hours on end while just waiting for a rare spawn, or camping
> some obscure item - and I have gotten it to 35, but it will not go
> any higher. In that same time I got my begging to 20, and my bind
> wound to 15. Something must be up.
>
> Harmonic.

Both ID and Begging are skills that only get a chance to increase if you are
successful. Once you get ID (and I assume Beg) over 50 it goes up fairly
fast and is actually useful when solo'ing. When solo'ing with ID I will
start using hitting it when the target is under 50% and I have successfully
chained it, as it will turn and not move :) Giving you several free shots.
You can practice ID on anything (corpses, players, pets, etc..) Beg can be
practiced on pets.

The best way I found to raise Bind Wounds (mine is maxed at 100) was to get
a backpack full of bandages and go to a crowded low-level dungeon
(Blackburrow is great for this) and shout out free wound binding at zone.
All the melee solo'ist will come and help you raise your skill.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
